verses.name: Luke 13:10
verses.text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath.

verses.name: Luke 13:11
verses.text: And, behold, there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years, and was bowed together, and could in no wise lift up herself.

verses.name: Luke 13:12
verses.text: And when Jesus saw her, he called her to him, and said unto her, Woman, thou art loosed from thine infirmity.

verses.name: Luke 13:13
verses.text: And he laid his hands on her: and immediately she was made straight, and glorified God.
